articles.title: Carter apologizes to teammates, owns poor effort in loss - NBC Sports Chicago
articles.description: The Bulls center called the team's season-opening, blowout loss to the Atlanta Hawks "reality" for a team that needs to exhibit better effort and resilience.
articles.content:
Wendell Carter Jr. didn't mince words after the Bulls fell to the Atlanta Hawks 124-104 in a season opener that didn't feel as close as the final score.
We just didnt come to play as a team," Carter… [+2747 chars]
